ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: The question
ygData.msgSnippet: This is definitely one of the best items in the game not just for stats but also a sense of accomplishment. You need to get all your crafting skills to a
ygData.messageBody:
This is definitely one of the best items in the game
not just for stats but also a sense of accomplishment.
You need to get all your crafting skills to a
significant level. But in the end if you can ride the
storm out, the reward is truly magnificent.

Good Luck

--- soonerweb <soonerweb@...> wrote:

> There is a great quest item with ext enhancement on
> it It is called
> the Blessed Coldain Prayer Shawl it is a tradeskill
> quest however and
> takes some time to complete and has the effect of
> "Zephyr of Brell"
> which is 30% extension on your beneficial spells, as
> a bonus it also
> has FT 3 as well. If you plan on getting your trade
> skills up then it
> would be a great piece of gear to get as it is a
> shoulder item,
> shoulders are the hardest piece of gear to upgrade.
>
>
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/item.html?item=11999
>
>
> \--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Greg"
> <freechylde@y...> wrote:
> > I did remeber the question...
> >
> > What is the "effect or effects" that I am looking
> for on gear that
> > extends things like KEI or makes temp last longer,
> for example...
> >
> > I have an enchanter and cleric and am looking for
> the right gear to
> > have on to make the most of the buffs and such....
> >
> > Thanks kids...
> > BE GOOD
> >
> > Greg
>
>
>
